Name: Bronze Hoof
About the game: A hardcore arcade game set in an ancient world. Your mission is to overcome numerous obstacles and defeat epic bosses in battle. To control your character, just use the left and right mouse buttons. The game is very simple to control, but challenging to master. If you love classic arcade games, if you enjoy a challenge, if you’re crazy about 2D graphics—this is the game for you! The game features 12 levels and 3 unique bosses. Each level has its own gameplay features. For example, on the first level all you have to do is jump over obstacles and shoot monsters with your bow and arrow. But the further you get, the more game mechanics you’ll encounter. In addition to regular jumping and shooting, you’ll fly, use magic, fight bosses, and do lots of other fun stuff! Get hooked on this hardcore runner right now!
